languages.text: "Наконец, мне выдался шанс — одна из тварей, с которыми я сражалась, повредила загон, и мне удалось выбраться с арены. Видел{mf||а} бы ты, как быстро мрази, что улюлюкали с трибун, кинулись наутек! Я проложила себе путь клинком и болтером, долго плутала во мраке... и потом оказалась здесь, где меня нашел верный слуга {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императора{/g} и дал шанс вновь послужить Ему".

traits.locale_text: "Наконец, мне выдался шанс — одна из тварей, с которыми я сражалась, повредила загон, и мне удалось выбраться с арены. Видел{mf||а} бы ты, как быстро мрази, что улюлюкали с трибун, кинулись наутек! Я проложила себе путь клинком и болтером, долго плутала во мраке... и потом оказалась здесь, где меня нашел верный слуга {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императора{/g} и дал шанс вновь послужить Ему".

languages.text: "At last, I had an opportunity — one of the beasts I fought damaged the enclosure, and I managed to escape the arena. You should have seen how quickly the scum who whooped and cheered from the stands set off after me! I forged a path with sword and bolter, and wandered for a long time in darkness... and then I wound up here, where a loyal servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} found me and gave me a chance to serve Him again."
languages.original_text: "Наконец, мне выдался шанс — одна из тварей, с которыми я сражалась, повредила загон, и мне удалось выбраться с арены. Видел{mf||а} бы ты, как быстро мрази, что улюлюкали с трибун, кинулись наутек! Я проложила себе путь клинком и болтером, долго плутала во мраке... и потом оказалась здесь, где меня нашел верный слуга {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императора{/g} и дал шанс вновь послужить Ему".

You should have seen how quickly the scum who whooped and cheered from the stands set off after me! I forged a path with sword and bolter, and wandered for a long time in darkness... and then I wound up here, where a loyal servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} found me and gave me a chance to serve Him again."

I forged a path with sword and bolter, and wandered for a long time in darkness... and then I wound up here, where a loyal servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} found me and gave me a chance to serve Him again."

"At last, I had an opportunity — one of the beasts I fought damaged the enclosure, and I managed to escape the arena. You should have seen how quickly the scum who whooped and cheered from the stands set off after me! I forged a path with sword and bolter, and wandered for a long time in darkness... and then I wound up here, where a loyal servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} found me and gave me a chance to serve Him again."

languages.text: “最后，我终于找到了逃生的机会。一头畜生和我战斗的时候撞坏了围栏，我想办法逃出了竞技场。那些在看台上欢呼雀跃的混蛋像发了疯一样地追我，要是你能看到当时的情形就好了！我用链锯剑和爆矢枪清出了一条道路，在黑暗中徘徊了很久……再后来，我就来到了这里。{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}的忠实仆人找到了我，给了我一个再次服侍祂的机会。”
languages.original_text: "At last, I had an opportunity — one of the beasts I fought damaged the enclosure, and I managed to escape the arena. You should have seen how quickly the scum who whooped and cheered from the stands set off after me! I forged a path with sword and bolter, and wandered for a long time in darkness... and then I wound up here, where a loyal servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} found me and gave me a chance to serve Him again."

traits.locale_text: “最后，我终于找到了逃生的机会。一头畜生和我战斗的时候撞坏了围栏，我想办法逃出了竞技场。那些在看台上欢呼雀跃的混蛋像发了疯一样地追我，要是你能看到当时的情形就好了！我用链锯剑和爆矢枪清出了一条道路，在黑暗中徘徊了很久……再后来，我就来到了这里。{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}的忠实仆人找到了我，给了我一个再次服侍祂的机会。”

languages.text: «Al final tuve una oportunidad: una de las bestias contra las que luchaba dañó el recinto y logré escapar de la arena. ¡Ojalá hubiera visto con qué velocidad la chusma que agitaba desde las gradas me persiguió! Me abrí paso con espada y bólter y después vagué por la oscuridad... hasta que acabé aquí, donde me ha sido dada la ocasión de volver a servir fielmente al {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g}».
languages.original_text: "At last, I had an opportunity — one of the beasts I fought damaged the enclosure, and I managed to escape the arena. You should have seen how quickly the scum who whooped and cheered from the stands set off after me! I forged a path with sword and bolter, and wandered for a long time in darkness... and then I wound up here, where a loyal servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} found me and gave me a chance to serve Him again."

traits.locale_text: «Al final tuve una oportunidad: una de las bestias contra las que luchaba dañó el recinto y logré escapar de la arena. ¡Ojalá hubiera visto con qué velocidad la chusma que agitaba desde las gradas me persiguió! Me abrí paso con espada y bólter y después vagué por la oscuridad... hasta que acabé aquí, donde me ha sido dada la ocasión de volver a servir fielmente al {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g}».

languages.text: 「ようやくその時がきた――何体目かの獣が囲いを破壊し、私は闘技場から逃げ出すことができた。観客席から喝采を浴びせてきたクズどもは、手のひらを返してすぐに私の後を追ってきた！剣とボルターで道を切り開き、長い間、暗闇をさまよい…ここにたどり着いた。{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}の忠実なしもべが私を見つけて、再び皇帝に仕える機会を与えてくれた」
languages.original_text: "At last, I had an opportunity — one of the beasts I fought damaged the enclosure, and I managed to escape the arena. You should have seen how quickly the scum who whooped and cheered from the stands set off after me! I forged a path with sword and bolter, and wandered for a long time in darkness... and then I wound up here, where a loyal servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} found me and gave me a chance to serve Him again."

traits.locale_text: 「ようやくその時がきた――何体目かの獣が囲いを破壊し、私は闘技場から逃げ出すことができた。観客席から喝采を浴びせてきたクズどもは、手のひらを返してすぐに私の後を追ってきた！剣とボルターで道を切り開き、長い間、暗闇をさまよい…ここにたどり着いた。{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}の忠実なしもべが私を見つけて、再び皇帝に仕える機会を与えてくれた」

languages.text: "Endlich bot sich mir eine Gelegenheit: Eines der Untiere hatte die Zellen beschädigt und ich konnte aus der Arena entkommen. Ihr hättet sehen sollen, wie schnell mir der Abschaum hinterherjagte, der mir vorher von der Tribüne aus zugejubelt hatte! Ich bahnte mir mit Schwert und Bolter einen Weg und irrte lange durch die Dunkelheit ... und dann landete ich hier, wo ein treuer Diener des {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperators{/g} mich fand und mir die Gelegenheit bot, ihm wieder zu dienen."
languages.original_text: "At last, I had an opportunity — one of the beasts I fought damaged the enclosure, and I managed to escape the arena. You should have seen how quickly the scum who whooped and cheered from the stands set off after me! I forged a path with sword and bolter, and wandered for a long time in darkness... and then I wound up here, where a loyal servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} found me and gave me a chance to serve Him again."

traits.locale_text: "Endlich bot sich mir eine Gelegenheit: Eines der Untiere hatte die Zellen beschädigt und ich konnte aus der Arena entkommen. Ihr hättet sehen sollen, wie schnell mir der Abschaum hinterherjagte, der mir vorher von der Tribüne aus zugejubelt hatte! Ich bahnte mir mit Schwert und Bolter einen Weg und irrte lange durch die Dunkelheit ... und dann landete ich hier, wo ein treuer Diener des {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperators{/g} mich fand und mir die Gelegenheit bot, ihm wieder zu dienen."

languages.text: « Puis j'ai fini par avoir ma chance : l'une des créatures que j'ai dû combattre a endommagé l'enceinte, ce qui m'a permis de m'enfuir de l'arène. Vous auriez dû voir la vitesse à laquelle ces scélérats dans les tribunes se sont lancés à ma poursuite alors qu'ils m'acclamaient quelques instants plus tôt ! Je me suis frayé un chemin à coups d'épée et de bolter, et j'ai longtemps erré dans l'obscurité... jusqu'à ce que je me retrouve ici, où un fidèle serviteur de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} m'a trouvée et m'a donné une chance de Le servir à nouveau. »
languages.original_text: "At last, I had an opportunity — one of the beasts I fought damaged the enclosure, and I managed to escape the arena. You should have seen how quickly the scum who whooped and cheered from the stands set off after me! I forged a path with sword and bolter, and wandered for a long time in darkness... and then I wound up here, where a loyal servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} found me and gave me a chance to serve Him again."

traits.locale_text: « Puis j'ai fini par avoir ma chance : l'une des créatures que j'ai dû combattre a endommagé l'enceinte, ce qui m'a permis de m'enfuir de l'arène. Vous auriez dû voir la vitesse à laquelle ces scélérats dans les tribunes se sont lancés à ma poursuite alors qu'ils m'acclamaient quelques instants plus tôt ! Je me suis frayé un chemin à coups d'épée et de bolter, et j'ai longtemps erré dans l'obscurité... jusqu'à ce que je me retrouve ici, où un fidèle serviteur de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} m'a trouvée et m'a donné une chance de Le servir à nouveau. »

languages.text: "Nihayet bir fırsat yakaladım... Dövüştüğüm yaratıklardan biri, arenanın duvarlarına hasar vermişti; ben de arenadan kaçabildim. Tribünlerden sevinç çığlığı atıp alkışlayan leşlerin ne çabuk peşime düştüğünü hele bir görseydin! Kılıcım ve silahımla zorla da olsa ilerleyebildim, uzun bir süre karanlıkta gezdim durdum... Nihayetinde kendimi burada buldum. {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator'un{/g} sadık hizmetkârlarından biri, beni bulup yeniden O'na hizmet etme fırsatı verdi."
languages.original_text: "At last, I had an opportunity — one of the beasts I fought damaged the enclosure, and I managed to escape the arena. You should have seen how quickly the scum who whooped and cheered from the stands set off after me! I forged a path with sword and bolter, and wandered for a long time in darkness... and then I wound up here, where a loyal servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} found me and gave me a chance to serve Him again."

traits.locale_text: "Nihayet bir fırsat yakaladım... Dövüştüğüm yaratıklardan biri, arenanın duvarlarına hasar vermişti; ben de arenadan kaçabildim. Tribünlerden sevinç çığlığı atıp alkışlayan leşlerin ne çabuk peşime düştüğünü hele bir görseydin! Kılıcım ve silahımla zorla da olsa ilerleyebildim, uzun bir süre karanlıkta gezdim durdum... Nihayetinde kendimi burada buldum. {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g}'un sadık hizmetkârlarından biri, beni bulup yeniden O'na hizmet etme fırsatı verdi."
